The new particles produced by CERN’s Large Hadron Collider are __________, lasting a millionth of a billionth of a billionth of a second before disintegrating into photons, quarks, or other particles.
A.	ephemeral
B.	infinitesimal
C.	myriad
D.	poignant
E.	fleeting
F.	countless
